titleInfo.title: Decoding Research-Oriented Teaching: Make Research Processes Explicit and Identify Research Competencies
Transforming patterns through the scholarship of teaching and learning. The 2nd European Conference for the Scholarship of Teaching and Learning, Lund, Sweden, 8-9 June 2017, Lund University
